class.name: Configuration
class.description: The root element of LDAP configuration.

field.name: version
field.description: The version of the persisted model.

field.name: connectionInfo
field.description: LDAP Connection Information.

field.name: userAndGroupConfig
field.description: The user and group mapping configuration mapping.

field.name: userRoleMappings
field.description: The mapping between users and roles if LDAP groups are not used.

field.name: searchBase
field.description: Search Base. Base DN for the connection.

field.name: systemUsername
field.description: System User. The username of user with access to the LDAP server.

field.name: systemPassword
field.description: System Password. The password for the System User.

field.name: authScheme
field.description: Authentication Scheme. Method used for authentication: none, simple, etc.

field.name: protocol
field.description: Protocol. The protocol used in the ldap URL: ldap, ldaps.

field.name: host
field.description: Host. The host name of the LDAP server.

field.name: port
field.description: Port. The port of the LDAP Server.

field.name: realm
field.description: SASL Realm. The authentication realm.

class.name: CUserAndGroupAuthConfiguration
class.description: The user and group mapping configuration mapping.

field.name: emailAddressAttribute
field.description: Email Address Attribute. The attribute that stores the users email address.

field.name: ldapGroupsAsRoles
field.description: Use LDAP groups as roles. True if LDAP groups should be used as roles.

field.name: groupBaseDn
field.description: Group Base DN. The base DN that defines Groups.

field.name: groupIdAttribute
field.description: Group Id Attribute. The ID attribute for the Group.

field.name: groupMemberAttribute
field.description: Group Member Attribute, An attribute that defines the a user is a member of the group.

field.name: groupMemberFormat
field.description: Group Member Format. The format that the user info is stored in the groupMappingsAttribute. Such as ${username}, or uid=${username},ou=people,o=yourBiz. ${username} will be replaced with the username.

field.name: groupObjectClass
field.description: Group Object Class. The Object class used for groups.

field.name: userPasswordAttribute
field.description: User Password Attribute. The attribute that stores the users password.

field.name: preferredPasswordEncoding
field.description:
TODO: Remove Field (no longer used)
Preferred Password Encoding. The encoding scheme used for user passwords: plain, crypt, ect

field.name: userIdAttribute
field.description: User Id Attribute. THe attribute of the userId field.

field.name: userObjectClass
field.description: User Object Class. The object class used for users.

field.name: userBaseDn
field.description: User Base DN. The base DN for the users.

field.name: userRealNameAttribute
field.description: User Real Name Attribute. The attribute that defines the users real name.

field.name: userSubtree
field.description: Users are Stored in a subtree of the userBaseDn.

field.name: groupSubtree
field.description: Groups are Stored in a subtree of the groupBaseDn.

field.name: userMemberOfAttribute
field.description: Groups are generally one of two types in LDAP systems - static or dynamic. A static group maintains its own membership list. A dynamic group records its membership on a user entry. If dynamic groups this should be set to the attribute used to store the group string in the user object.

field.name: ldapFilter
field.description: Filter to limit user search to user with specific attribute.

class.name: CUserRoleMapping
class.description: Defines the mapping between users and roles, if LDAP groups are not used.

field.name: userId
field.description: User ID. The id of the user.

field.name: roles
field.description: List of the users roles.
